description.zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国的第二代最高领导人。其出生地存在争议，苏联解密文件称其于1941年出生于苏联哈巴罗夫斯克附近的维亚茨科耶军营，而朝鲜官方则声称其于1942年出生于两江道三池渊郡的白头山密营。
description.en: The second supreme leader of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea. His birthplace is disputed; declassified Soviet documents state he was born in 1941 in a military camp in Vyatskoye near Khabarovsk, USSR, while North Korean official sources claim he was born in 1942 in a secret camp on Mount Paektu in Samjiyon County, Ryanggang Province.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国的创建者及第一代最高领导人，金正日之父。
description.en: The founder and first supreme leader of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, father of Kim Jong-il.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国的第三代最高领导人，金正日之子及接班人。
description.en: The third supreme leader of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, son and successor of Kim Jong-il.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling party of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.

nodes.id: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国

zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚朝鲜半岛北部的国家。
description.en: A country in East Asia, constituting the northern part of the Korean Peninsula.

zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国国防委员会
en: National Defence Commission of North Korea

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国曾经的国家主权的最高军事领导机关和国防管理机关。
description.en: The former highest military leadership and national defense management body of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国的武装力量。
description.en: The armed forces of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.

description.zh-cn: 金日成的第一任妻子，金正日之母。
description.en: The first wife of Kim Il-sung and the mother of Kim Jong-il.

description.zh-cn: 金正日的第一任妻子。
description.en: Kim Jong-il's first wife.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜女演员，被视为金正日的第二任妻子，金正男之母。
description.en: A North Korean actress, considered the second wife of Kim Jong-il and the mother of Kim Jong-nam.

description.zh-cn: 金正日的继任妻子，1974年与其结婚。
description.en: Kim Jong-il's successive wife, married in 1974.

description.zh-cn: 在日朝鲜人，被视为金正日的第四任妻子，金正哲、金正恩和金与正之母。
description.en: A Zainichi Korean, considered the fourth wife of Kim Jong-il and the mother of Kim Jong-chol, Kim Jong-un, and Kim Yo-jong.

description.zh-cn: 金正日的继任妻子，曾担任其技术书记。
description.en: Kim Jong-il's successive wife, formerly his technical secretary.

description.zh-cn: 金正日的长子，曾被视为继承人，后失势并于马来西亚遇刺身亡。
description.en: The eldest son of Kim Jong-il, once considered his successor, later fell from favor and was assassinated in Malaysia.

description.zh-cn: 位于朝鲜平壤的大学，是朝鲜的第一所大学。
description.en: A university in Pyongyang, North Korea, and the country's first university.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的国家。
description.en: A country in East Asia.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中国共产党中央委员会总书记、中华人民共和国主席，为中共第三代中央领导集体核心。
description.en: Former General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and President of the People's Republic of China, the core of the third generation of CPC central leadership.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中国共产党中央委员会总书记、中华人民共和国主席，为中共第四代中央领导集体核心。
description.en: Former General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and President of the People's Republic of China, the core of the fourth generation of CPC central leadership.

description.zh-cn: 大韩民国第15任总统。
description.en: The 15th President of the Republic of Korea.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜半岛分裂后，朝鲜最高领导人金正日与韩国总统金大中在平壤举行的首次会晤。
description.en: The first summit between North Korean supreme leader Kim Jong-il and South Korean president Kim Dae-jung in Pyongyang after the division of the Korean Peninsula.

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯政治家，现任俄罗斯总统。
description.en: A Russian politician, the current president of Russia.

description.zh-cn: 日本第87、88、89任内阁总理大臣。
description.en: The 87th, 88th, and 89th Prime Minister of Japan.

description.zh-cn: 由日本首相小泉纯一郎和朝鲜国防委员会委员长金正日签署的宣言，旨在实现两国关系正常化。
description.en: A declaration signed by Japanese Prime Minister Junichiro Koizumi and North Korean National Defence Commission Chairman Kim Jong-il, aiming to normalize relations between the two countries.

nodes.id: 北朝鲜绑架日本人问题

zh-cn: 北朝鲜绑架日本人问题
en: North Korean abductions of Japanese citizens

description.zh-cn: 指朝鲜于1970年代末至1980年代初，多次在日本以及欧洲绑架日本人的事件。
description.en: A series of events in the late 1970s and early 1980s where North Korea abducted Japanese citizens from Japan and Europe.

description.zh-cn: 1983年朝鲜企图在缅甸仰光刺杀时任韩国总统全斗焕的事件。
description.en: An assassination attempt by North Korea against then-South Korean President Chun Doo-hwan in Rangoon, Burma, in 1983.

description.zh-cn: 大韩民国第11、12任总统。
description.en: The 11th and 12th President of the Republic of Korea.

description.zh-cn: 韩国著名女演员，曾被朝鲜特工绑架至朝鲜。
description.en: A famous South Korean actress who was abducted to North Korea by its agents.

description.zh-cn: 一起由朝鲜特工制造的针对大韩航空858号班机的炸弹恐怖袭击事件。
description.en: A bombing terrorist attack on Korean Air Flight 858, carried out by North Korean agents.

description.zh-cn: 美国第43任总统。
description.en: The 43rd President of the United States.

description.zh-cn: 位于黄海京畿湾的韩国岛屿，2010年遭到朝鲜炮击。
description.en: A South Korean island group in the Gyeonggi Bay of the Yellow Sea, shelled by North Korea in 2010.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜官方宣布金正日于2011年12月17日因心肌梗死去世的事件。
description.en: The event of North Korea's official announcement that Kim Jong-il died of a heart attack on December 17, 2011.

location.zh-cn: 苏联哈巴罗夫斯克边疆区

description.zh-cn: 位于俄罗斯哈巴罗夫斯克边疆区的村庄，根据苏联记录，是金正日的出生地。
description.en: A village in Khabarovsk Krai, Russia, which according to Soviet records is the birthplace of Kim Jong-il.

location.zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国的首都和最大城市。
description.en: The capital and largest city of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.

description.zh-cn: 金正日是金日成的长子。
description.en: Kim Jong-il is the eldest son of Kim Il-sung.

description.zh-cn: 金正日是金正淑的儿子。
description.en: Kim Jong-il is the son of Kim Jong-suk.

description.zh-cn: 金正恩是金正日的第三子。
description.en: Kim Jong-un is the third son of Kim Jong-il.

description.zh-cn: 金正男是金正日的长子。
description.en: Kim Jong-nam is the eldest son of Kim Jong-il.

description.zh-cn: 金正日于1966年与第一任妻子洪一天结婚，1970年离异。
description.en: Kim Jong-il married his first wife, Hong Il-chon, in 1966 and they divorced in 1970.

description.zh-cn: 自1968年起，金正日与被视为其第二任妻子的成蕙琳同居，直至其2002年逝世。她是金正男的母亲。
description.en: Starting in 1968, Kim Jong-il cohabited with Song Hye-rim, considered his second wife, until her death in 2002. She was the mother of Kim Jong-nam.

description.zh-cn: 金正日于1974年与金英淑结婚。
description.en: Kim Jong-il married Kim Young-sook in 1974.

description.zh-cn: 自1977年起，金正日与被视为其第四任妻子的高容姬同居，直至其2004年逝世。她是金正哲、金正恩和金与正的母亲。
description.en: Starting in 1977, Kim Jong-il cohabited with Ko Yong-hui, considered his fourth wife, until her death in 2004. She was the mother of Kim Jong-chol, Kim Jong-un, and Kim Yo-jong.

description.zh-cn: 金正日在高容姬去世后，与金玉结婚。
description.en: After the death of Ko Yong-hui, Kim Jong-il married Kim Ok.

description.zh-cn: 金正日于1960年至1964年在金日成综合大学经济系政治经济学专业学习。
description.en: From 1960 to 1964, Kim Jong-il studied Political Economy in the Department of Economics at Kim Il-sung University.

position.zh-cn: 总书记、中央政治局常务委员、中央军事委员会委员长
position.en: General Secretary, Member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau, Chairman of the Central Military Commission

description.zh-cn: 金正日于1961年加入朝鲜劳动党，并逐步晋升，最终担任总书记等党内最高职务。
description.en: Kim Jong-il joined the Workers' Party of Korea in 1961 and was gradually promoted, eventually holding the highest party positions such as General Secretary.

description.zh-cn: 金正日自1993年起担任朝鲜国防委员会委员长，直至逝世。
description.en: Kim Jong-il served as Chairman of the National Defence Commission of North Korea from 1993 until his death.

description.zh-cn: 金正日自1991年起担任朝鲜人民军最高司令官，直至逝世。
description.en: Kim Jong-il served as the Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army from 1991 until his death.

description.zh-cn: 金日成将金正日培养为接班人，并提议他担任朝鲜人民军最高司令官、国防委员会委员长等关键职务。
description.en: Kim Il-sung groomed Kim Jong-il as his successor and proposed him for key positions such as Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army and Chairman of the National Defence Commission.

description.zh-cn: 2000年6月，金正日与时任韩国总统金大中在平壤举行了历史性的首次朝韩首脑会晤。
description.en: In June 2000, Kim Jong-il met with then-South Korean President Kim Dae-jung in Pyongyang for the historic first inter-Korean summit.

description.zh-cn: 2000年朝韩首脑会晤是金正日作为朝鲜最高领导人与韩国总统的首次会晤，缓和了南北关系。
description.en: The 2000 inter-Korean summit was the first meeting between Kim Jong-il as the supreme leader of North Korea and a South Korean president, easing inter-Korean relations.

description.zh-cn: 2000年7月，金正日与首次访问朝鲜的俄罗斯总统普京举行会谈，恢复了因苏联与韩国建交而中断的俄朝关系。
description.en: In July 2000, Kim Jong-il held talks with Russian President Vladimir Putin during his first visit to North Korea, restoring Russia-North Korea relations that had been suspended after the Soviet Union established diplomatic ties with South Korea.

description.zh-cn: 金正日曾多次应时任中共中央总书记、中国国家主席江泽民的邀请对中国进行非正式访问。
description.en: Kim Jong-il made several unofficial visits to China at the invitation of then-CPC General Secretary and Chinese President Jiang Zemin.

description.zh-cn: 金正日曾多次应时任中共中央总书记、中国国家主席胡锦涛的邀请对中国进行非正式访问。
description.en: Kim Jong-il made several unofficial visits to China at the invitation of then-CPC General Secretary and Chinese President Hu Jintao.

description.zh-cn: 2002年9月，金正日与时任日本首相小泉纯一郎会晤，签署了《日朝平壤宣言》，并首次承认绑架日本人问题。
description.en: In September 2002, Kim Jong-il met with then-Japanese Prime Minister Junichiro Koizumi, signed the Japan-North Korea Pyongyang Declaration, and admitted for the first time to the abduction of Japanese citizens.

description.zh-cn: 金正日与小泉纯一郎共同签署了《日朝平壤宣言》。
description.en: Kim Jong-il, along with Junichiro Koizumi, signed the Japan-North Korea Pyongyang Declaration.

relationships.target: 北朝鲜绑架日本人问题

description.zh-cn: 根据脱北者说法，金正日策划或指挥了朝鲜绑架日本人事件。他本人也在2002年向日本首相小泉纯一郎承认并道歉。
description.en: According to defectors, Kim Jong-il planned or directed the North Korean abductions of Japanese citizens. He himself admitted to and apologized for it to Japanese Prime Minister Junichiro Koizumi in 2002.

description.zh-cn: 根据脱北者说法，金正日策划或指挥了1983年旨在刺杀韩国总统全斗焕的仰光爆炸事件。
description.en: According to defectors, Kim Jong-il planned or directed the 1983 Rangoon bombing, which aimed to assassinate South Korean President Chun Doo-hwan.

description.zh-cn: 仰光爆炸事件是一次针对韩国总统全斗焕的未遂刺杀。
description.en: The Rangoon bombing was an unsuccessful assassination attempt against South Korean President Chun Doo-hwan.

description.zh-cn: 根据脱北者说法，金正日授意绑架了韩国女演员崔银姬。
description.en: According to defectors, Kim Jong-il ordered the kidnapping of South Korean actress Choi Eun-hee.

description.zh-cn: 根据脱北者说法，金正日策划或指挥了1987年的大韩航空858号班机空难。
description.en: According to defectors, Kim Jong-il planned or directed the bombing of Korean Air Flight 858 in 1987.

description.zh-cn: 2010年11月23日，朝鲜人民军向韩国延坪岛进行了炮击，造成韩方人员伤亡和财产损失。
description.en: On November 23, 2010, the Korean People's Army shelled South Korea's Yeonpyeong Island, causing casualties and property damage.

description.zh-cn: 美国总统小布什曾公开批评金正日无心治国，不管老百姓死活。
description.en: U.S. President George W. Bush publicly criticized Kim Jong-il for neglecting his country and not caring about the welfare of his people.

description.zh-cn: 金正日于2011年12月17日去世。
description.en: Kim Jong-il died on December 17, 2011.

description.zh-cn: 金正日去世后，其子金正恩接替他成为朝鲜最高领导人。
description.en: After Kim Jong-il's death, his son Kim Jong-un succeeded him as the supreme leader of North Korea.

description.zh-cn: 长子金正男因2001年持假护照试图进入日本而失宠，丧失了继承朝鲜最高领袖的可能性，并长期流亡海外。
description.en: His eldest son, Kim Jong-nam, fell out of favor after attempting to enter Japan on a fake passport in 2001, lost the possibility of succeeding as the supreme leader of North Korea, and lived in exile for many years.

description.zh-cn: 根据苏联方面的记录，金正日于1941年2月16日在苏联哈巴罗夫斯克附近的维亚茨科耶军营出生。
description.en: According to Soviet records, Kim Jong-il was born on February 16, 1941, in a military camp in Vyatskoye near Khabarovsk, Soviet Union.
